apps.command.developersOnly: {{.Command}} is only available in developers mode. You need to enable `Developer Mode` and `Testing Commands` in the System Console.
apps.command.disable.error.appID: you need to specify the app id
apps.command.enable.error.appID: you need to specify the app id
apps.command.enableBot: the system setting `Enable Bot Account Creation` needs to be enabled in order for the Apps plugin to work. Please go to {{.URL}} and enable it.
apps.command.enableOAuth: the system setting `Enable OAuth 2.0 Service Provider` needs to be enabled in order for the Apps plugin to work. Please go to {{.URL}} and enable it.
apps.command.error.invalidArguments: invalid arguments to command.Handler. Please contact your system administrator
apps.command.error.mustBeAdmin: you need to be a system admin to run this command
apps.command.error.noSubCommand: no subcommand specified, nothing to do
apps.command.install.aws.error.manifest: failed to get manifest from S3
apps.command.install.aws.error.version: you must specify the app version
apps.command.install.error.appID: you must specify the app id
apps.command.install.fillDialog: please continue by filling out the interactive form
apps.command.install.http.error.url: you must specify a manifest URL
apps.command.list.table.header: | Name | Status | Type | Version | Account | Locations | Permissions |
apps.command.notSupported: {{.Command}} is not a supported command and should not have been invoked. Please contact your system administrator
apps.command.uninstall.error.needAppId: you need to specify the app id
